tool_description: Validates app screenshots against platform-specific requirements including dimensions, content guidelines, and quality standards.
error_messages: Screenshot not found: One or more screenshot files could not be located.
Invalid dimensions: Screenshot dimensions don't match platform requirements for specified device types.
Unsupported format: Screenshots must be PNG or JPEG format.
Content violation: Screenshots contain prohibited content or UI elements.
Quality too low: Screenshot resolution or quality doesn't meet minimum standards.
Unsupported platform: Only 'ios' and 'android' platforms are supported.
usage: Provide screenshot_paths array, platform, and device_types. Tool validates each screenshot against platform-specific requirements and content policies.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: passed, failed, or needs_review

valid_screenshots.description: Number of screenshots that passed validation

device_coverage.description: Device types covered by valid screenshots
